tool_description: This is an API which extracts news/article body from a URL and uses GPT to summarize (and optionally translate) the article content. Useful for text mining purposes. Leverages powerful and flexible web scraping engine (ScrapeNinja.net) with high-quality rotating proxies under the hood. In depth review and API implementation details: https://pixeljets.com/blog/gpt-summary-is-broken/ . My video where ChatGPT summary capabilities are explored: https://youtu.be/hRQqJtgYz_Q
title: Article Extractor and Summarizer

api_list.name: /summarize
api_list.description: Summarizes the article after extracting it from the specified url.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Target language to translate summary into

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: pass TRUE if you want to convert new line symbols in API response text with html paragraph tags

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length in paragraphs. This parameter might be ignored for a very long articles.

utterances.utterance: Can you summarize the article at https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-66028706?
Give me a summary in Spanish of the article from https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/01/world/asia/china-economy.html.
Extract and summarize the main points from https://www.cnn.com/2023/06/30/tech/ai-regulation-europe/index.html in French.
Summarize the article at https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/markets-wrap-up-2023-06-30/ and format the summary with HTML paragraphs.
Can you give me a short summary, just 2 paragraphs, of https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2023/jun/30/climate-change-report?
Please summarize the article at https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/6/30/ukraine-war-latest-updates in German.
Summarize the main points from https://www.npr.org/2023/06/30/1185234567/supreme-court-student-loans-decision and make sure the summary is 5 paragraphs long.
Can you extract and summarize the article at https://www.wsj.com/articles/stock-market-today-2023-06-30 in Italian?
Give me a summary of https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/new-discoveries-in-quantum-physics/ and use HTML formatting.
Summarize the article at https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestechcouncil/2023/06/30/the-future-of-ai-in-business/ in Japanese and keep it to 1 paragraph.

api_list.name: /extract
api_list.description: Extract an article body and markdown version of the body.

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the article from https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-66231873?
Get the full text of the article at https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/18/technology/ai-ethics-debate.html.
Extract and summarize the content from https://www.cnn.com/2023/07/19/health/heat-wave-safety/index.html.
Please pull the article body from https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2023/jul/20/climate-crisis-heatwaves-europe.
Can you extract the news story at https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-war-latest-updates-2023-07-21/?
Get the main article text from https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/7/22/africa-summit-climate-change.
Extract the body of the article at https://www.wsj.com/articles/stock-market-today-july-24-2023-11689912345.
Please extract the article from https://www.npr.org/2023/07/23/1190000000/ai-music-copyright-issues.
Can you get the article content from https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestechcouncil/2023/07/25/the-future-of-ai-in-business/?sh=1234567890ab?
Extract the news article at https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/new-discoveries-in-space-july-2023/.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you summarize this article for me?
Give me a summary of the text I provide.
Please provide a concise summary of the following content.
Summarize the main points of this document.
Could you give me a brief overview of this text?
I need a summary in Markdown format for this article.
Extract and summarize the key information from this passage.
Can you condense this article into a short summary?
Summarize the following news story for me.
Give me a quick summary of the provided text.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
